feed.title: Fedify Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Fedify: Fedify 1.0.5
entry.content:
Released on October 23, 2024.

  • The fetchDocumentLoader() function now preloads the following JSON-LD context: https://purl.archive.org/socialweb/webfinger.

entry.title: New release for Fedify: Fedify 1.1.1
entry.content:
Released on October 23, 2024.

  • The fetchDocumentLoader() function now preloads the following JSON-LD context: https://purl.archive.org/socialweb/webfinger.

entry.title: New release for Fedify: Fedify 0.15.4
entry.content:
Released on October 27, 2024.

  • Fixed default document loaders' incorrect handling of relative URIs in Link headers with rel=alternate. [#155 by Emelia Smith]
  • The fetchDocumentLoader() function now preloads the following JSON-LD context: http://schema.org/.
